title: Explore JavaScript
details: Become a JavaScript expert with just One course. You will learn JS core concepts (Variable, Object, Array, Condition, loop, Function), ES6 concepts and DOM manipulation
courseOverview: Learn JavaScript from scratch and in great detail - from beginner to advanced
All core features and concepts you need to know in modern JavaScript development
Build 5 beautiful real-world projects for your portfolio
Become job-ready by understanding how JavaScript really works behind the scenes

title: Start with HTML, CSS & Bootstrap
details: Learn modern HTML5, CSS3 & Bootstrap and build a stunning website for your portfolio. Includes CSS Flexbox, Grid and Animation
courseOverview: Become a modern and confident HTML and CSS developer, no prior knowledge needed
Design and build a stunning real-world project for your portfolio from scratch
Modern, semantic and accessible HTML5
Modern CSS, including Animation, CSS Flexbox and Grid for layout

title: The Modern React Bootcamp (Hooks, Context, Router)
details: Learn React from the beginning! Including React Router, hooks, context, front-end Stripe & a big project
courseOverview: The basics of React (props, state, etc)
React Hooks!
The new Context API
React Router and Private Route

title: Python Zero to Hero
details: This course aims to teach everyone the basics of programming computers using Python. Variables & Expressions, Conditional Code, Functions, Loops & Iteration and more will be taught
courseOverview: Have a fundamental understanding of the Python3
Become a professional Python Developer and get hired
Acquire the pre-requisite Python skills to move into specific branches - Machine Learning, Data Science and so on
Build some python app to solve real life problem

title: Python for Data Science and Machine Learning
details: Learn how to use NumPy, Pandas, Seaborn , Matplotlib , Plotly , Scikit-Learn , Machine Learning, Tensorflow and more
courseOverview: Use Python for Data Science and Machine Learning
Use Spark for Big Data Analysis
Implement Machine Learning Algorithms
Learn to use NumPy for Numerical Data

title: Basic Java to Complete Android App Development
details: Android App Development with Android Studio & Java, boost your android development skills with 7 different Android Apps
courseOverview: Go from a complete beginner - even with no previous programming experience - to a real Android App Developer
Building real apps and publish them to playstore
Become a professional Native app developer
Switch careers and get a job as an Android Developer

title: The Complete Backend Bootcamp (Node.js, Express, MongoDB)
details: Master Node by building a real-world RESTful API and web app (with authentication, Node.js security, payments & more)
courseOverview: Master the entire modern back-end stack: Node, Express, MongoDB and Mongoose (MongoDB JS driver)
Build a complete, beautiful & real-world application from start to finish (API and server-side rendered website)
Build a fast, scalable, feature-rich RESTful API (includes filters, sorts, pagination, and much more)
Learn how Node really works behind the scenes: event loop, blocking vs non-blocking code, streams, modules

title: CCNA: Switching, Routing, Wireless Essentials, Security and More
details: The complete course to help you prepare and pass Cisco's newest CCNA exam. Everything you need: Theory and labs
courseOverview: This course is for anyone who wants to attain the Cisco CCNA certification
Once you complete this course and pass your CCNA exam, you can study towards higher level Cisco certifications
Explore how routing and switching technologies work in real world environments
Start a career in networking

title: Deep Dive on Solidity and BlockChain Technology
details: Become An Ethereum Blockchain Developer With One Course. Master Solidity, Web3.JS, Truffle, Metamask, Remix & More
courseOverview: Learn the true purpose and capabilities of Ethereum and Solidity
Design, test, and deploy secure Smart Contracts
Build compelling blockchain applications using the Ethereum Blockchain
Using Ethereum's Core Development Tools
